title: Debating When The 'Age Of Humans' Began
description: Humans have changed the Earth in such profound ways that scientists say we have entered a new geological period: the Anthropocene Epoch.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Debating When The 'Age Of Humans' Began
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Scientists are hunting for geological evidence to pinpoint exactly when humans became a major force shaping life on Earth. But settling on the date could unleash a larger debate.
itunes:subtitle: Scientists are hunting for geological evidence to pinpoint exactly when humans became a major force shaping life on Earth. But settling on the date could unleash a larger debate.
content:encoded: Humans have changed the Earth in such profound ways that scientists say we have entered a new geological period: the Anthropocene Epoch.
